description: A React component for listing and managing jobs with real-time updates, sorting, filtering, and UI elements. Implements fetching job data from an API, real-time WebSocket updates, and UI rendering.

methods.name: fetchJobs
methods.description: Fetches job list data from the API and updates the component state.

methods.name: getStatusBadge
methods.description: Returns a Badge component with the appropriate status variant based on job status.

methods.name: toggleSort
methods.description: Switches sorting order for a specified sort key.
